name: Wek Zombie Defense
description:
Wek Zombie Defense

Create one of two towers on designated plots to defense against the zombie hoard. There are 3 types of zombies to be aware of.  The standard zombie is a medium paced and well hearty foe. The fast zombie will slip right through your defense. The beast zombie is a tough but slow killer. 

This game was made in under one week as a personal game jam to create a tower defense in a short time. About 20 hours was put into the project. All sprites and sounds were purchased or licensed to use; however, the coding and design was done personally.
